name: Thomas Keller
bio: Thomas Keller, who had been inspired by classic cookbooks as a novice chef, published The French Laundry Cookbook in 1999. TIME magazine named him “America's Best Chef” in 2001.

name: Grant Achatz
bio: Grant Achatz is an American chef and restaurateur often recognized for his contributions to molecular gastronomy or progressive cuisine.

name: Gavin Kaysen
bio: Gavin Kaysen is executive chef and owner of Spoon and Stable, Bellecour Bakery, Demi, Socca, and Mara all in Minneapolis. He received the James Beard Award for Best Chef: Midwest in 2018

name: Dan Barber
bio: Dan Barber is the chef and co-owner of Blue Hill in Manhattan and Blue Hill at Stone Barns in Pocantico Hills, New York, United States. He is the author of The Third Plate.

name: Wolfgang Puck
bio: Wolfgang Johannes Puck is an Austrian-American chef and restaurateur. Bellecour Bakery, Demi, Socca, and Mara all in Minneapolis. He received the James Beard Award for Best Chef: Midwest in 2018

name: Dominique Crenn
bio: Dominique Crenn is a French chef. As of 2016, she is the only female chef in the United States to attain three Michelin stars, for her restaurant Atelier Crenn, in San Francisco, California
